channel.title: DDspecz || re-release || Roat Pkz source || Vps hosted || Customs ||
channel.description:
DDspecz is a client from the rs2 development section, so all credits to the dude who released the source.
After Downloading this source I found many bugs which I needed to work on and that is what I've done, now I can proudly say DDSpecz is a working server which is enjoyable and worth playing.
[size=24pt]This server is a 317 Spawn server[/size] [size=18pt]Play Now! >>>[url=http://]https://www.dropbox.com/s/wkgjjw057gxk5sl/ddspecz.jar?dl=0[/url]<<<[/size] [size=18pt]*if it says something alone the lines of "a java exception has occurred", than all you need to do is get the latest java update from oracle.com[/size]
Here are some of the features: -Customer killstreak system http://gyazo.com/5b38420926e08d1cfa9282379c40b044 http://gyazo.com/e8d90f0bae449736bc63c2c52d01c7dc http://gyazo.com/81844998f931b651f73faea0df5c0f68 The rewards for killstreaks are: 3ks = 5pkp 4ks = 7pkp 5ks = 10 pkp 6 ks = 15 pkp 7 ks = 20 pkp 8 ks = 25 pkp 9 ks = 30 pkp 10 ks = 100 pkp
Pker's Cape: http://gyazo.com/6e87e99a31c2c1b4222a0522c5fea0a8 http://gyazo.com/a1fae5d1c5e68639aa40ab8b7f40919e
PKP shop: http://gyazo.com/37e37077f877043a168a120cd2aff0ad http://gyazo.com/138d88bfc22ad7b0772713dd8aadf986
Donator store: http://gyazo.com/4593a3fdaf43c45c08976d122837380f http://gyazo.com/ec539e088c4163f7da67989ce03b32d5 *This is just an idea what you can get from them* http://gyazo.com/2b1d643c107bbbde7aa84d7682b3edca http://gyazo.com/13febf409246ec37c18defe06da462a7
Second Donator store which is free to buy from if you have the donator status: http://gyazo.com/ff6a5450874ae21125f3cf1e20861bd9 http://gyazo.com/c47b8f3f6710514b25434aec18b7a860
Pking spots: -Edgeville Pures http://gyazo.com/ab65c238d64d7d36d51dfbbeb144912e -Multizone (::varrock) http://gyazo.com/05b4c26bfb2b4abe2504e3295383906a -hybrid area (::easts) http://gyazo.com/629b8b187f3c55c01ae8bdee2cd9deea -Edgeville mains http://gyazo.com/3979596a70484ac3998cef0a07f6c34d
I know not everyone likes to Pk all the time due to costs and lack of equipment so we also have this: -Pvm teleport (donators only) http://gyazo.com/1bf08a41ee2a00c2e9829d2d3a59b68f http://gyazo.com/767926a8957ccc1ef7478740b13cdff1
Custom Items: http://gyazo.com/dc760284a6cf1ac1cbd841c00a1788b8
[size=18pt]This server has a lot features and things to do so why not try it out today![/size]

item.description:
@safedude10 wrote:

DDspecz is a client from the rs2 development section, so all credits to the dude who released the source.

After Downloading this source I found many bugs which I needed to work on and that is what I’ve done, now I can proudly say DDSpecz is a working server which is enjoyable and worth playing.

[size=24pt]This server is a 317 Spawn server[/size]
[size=18pt]Play Now! >>>https://www.dropbox.com/s/wkgjjw057gxk5sl/ddspecz.jar?dl=0<<<[/size]
[size=18pt]*if it says something alone the lines of “a java exception has occurred”, than all you need to do is get the latest java update from oracle.com[/size]

Here are some of the features:
-Customer killstreak system
http://gyazo.com/5b38420926e08d1cfa9282379c40b044
http://gyazo.com/e8d90f0bae449736bc63c2c52d01c7dc
http://gyazo.com/81844998f931b651f73faea0df5c0f68

3ks = 5pkp
4ks = 7pkp

9 ks = 30 pkp
10 ks = 100 pkp
